title: Jeb: 修复了一个有关漏斗的bug
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 17:47 编辑 

Jeb：I discovered why the hoppers still are out-of-synch in the snapshot. It's about in which order they tick
Jeb：我已经发现为什么在快照中漏斗仍然不同步。这大概是因为which order they tick（怎么翻译？）
xisumavoid：Oh fantastic! Is this something you can correct? Thanks for listening btw, the redstone community will be very thankful :-)
xisumavoid：Oh，很精彩！你能不能修复这个bug？谢谢听到这个bug，顺便说一下，红石社区会非常让人感谢
Jeb：Yes I've added a fix for it... they are now in perfect synch in my test world. Again, every change comes with new surprises ;)
Jeb：是的，我已经修复了这个bug...现在漏斗在我的测试世界里同步了。再说一遍，每一个改变的到来总会伴随着新惊喜




QQ截图20160903001624.png (50.33 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2016-9-3 00:10 上传





热心的网友在Reddit上发表了1.10.2和16w35a快照中漏斗差异，这是gif地址：https://gfycat.com/CautiousLazyHorse

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
in which order they tick
是指依赖于它们刻的顺序。比如说在一个gametick 中什么元件先更新，什么元件后更新

replies.author: konglongdou
replies.txt_content: 翻译的时候“ in which order they tick”是一起翻的……“in which order”是一个从句……大概的意思“它们以怎样的顺序‘tick’”（不知道tick怎么翻）
